article_title: 2 U.S. soldiers subdue gunman on French train
article_text:
North Andover, MA (01845)

Today

Sunny along with a few clouds. High around 85F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 60F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: Greg Keller Associated Press

og.description: PARIS — A gunman opened fire on a high-speed train traveling from Amsterdam to Paris on Friday, wounding two people before two American passengers subdued him, officials said.
